welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Hamminkeln, a charming city known for its scenic beauty and rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer. Have a wonderful stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Weeze Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Weeze Airport, primarily used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Stadtlohn Vreden Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Stadtlohn Vreden Airport is equipped to handle a wide range of cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional and low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
